Package src.main.java.gameComponents

Class Check

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.gameComponents.Check
public class Check extends Object
Provides static methods to validate moves, construction, and game statuses in the Santorini board game.

      public Check()

  • Method Details

    • isInsideBoard

      public static boolean isInsideBoard(Board board, int xPos, int yPos)
      Checks if the specified position is inside the standard 5x5 board.
      Parameters:
      board - the Board object.
      xPos - the row index to check.
      yPos - the column index to check.
      Returns:
      true if [xPos, yPos] is within [0..4], false otherwise.

    • isMoveCorrect

      public static boolean isMoveCorrect(int sxPos, int syPos, int fxPos, int fyPos)
      Checks if the move from [sxPos, syPos] to [fxPos, fyPos] is within one cell distance.
      Parameters:
      sxPos - starting x-position.
      syPos - starting y-position.
      fxPos - final x-position.
      fyPos - final y-position.
      Returns:
      false if it is the same cell or more than 1 cell away, true otherwise.

    • isWorkerPresent

      public static boolean isWorkerPresent(Board board, int xPos, int yPos)
      Checks if the Worker is present in the cell. Note: The original code had inverted logic. Here we name it clearly:
      Parameters:
      board - the Board object.
      xPos - the x-position of the cell.
      yPos - the y-position of the cell.
      Returns:
      true if a worker is present, false otherwise.

    • isValidMovement

      public static boolean isValidMovement(Board board, int sxPos, int syPos, int fxPos, int fyPos)
      Checks if a movement from start to final positions is valid, considering the presence of a dome or another worker and the height difference.
      Parameters:
      board - the current Board.
      sxPos - starting x-position.
      syPos - starting y-position.
      fxPos - final x-position.
      fyPos - final y-position.
      Returns:
      true if the movement is valid, false otherwise.

    • WinCondition

      public static boolean WinCondition(Board board, int xPos, int yPos)
      Checks if a Worker at [xPos, yPos] is on a tower of height 3 (winning condition).
      Parameters:
      board - the Board object.
      xPos - the x-position to check.
      yPos - the y-position to check.
      Returns:
      true if the cell's tower height is 3, false otherwise.

    • isValidConstruction

      public static boolean isValidConstruction(Board board, int fxPos, int fyPos)
      Checks if a construction on [fxPos, fyPos] is valid (not a dome).
      Parameters:
      board - the Board object.
      fxPos - the x-position where the worker attempts to build.
      fyPos - the y-position where the worker attempts to build.
      Returns:
      true if a new level can be built, false otherwise.

    • PossibleMovement

      public static boolean PossibleMovement(Board board, int[][] workers)
      Checks if any of the two workers of the current player can move.
      Parameters:
      board - the Board object.
      workers - an array containing positions of the player's 2 workers, in the form [[x1, y1], [x2, y2]].
      Returns:
      true if at least one worker can move, false if neither can move.
